key.name: android-command
key.description: Specifies the command-line executable for the "android" tool within the Android SDK.

key.name: default-package-namespace
key.description: Default package namespace to use when creating a new Android project.

key.name: default-project-path
key.description: Default location when creating a new Android project.

key.name: default-build-target
key.description: The ID for the default build target when creating a new Android project.

key.name: console-font
key.description: The font family and size for the font used in the console pane.
